OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord prior therapy ( liver metastasis resection v ablation without resection ) . Within 4-8 week prior resection ablation , patient receive hepatic arterial infusion floxuridine continuously day 1-14 irinotecan IV 30 minute day 1 15 . Treatment repeat every 28 day 6 course absence unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year .
